title: 2025 MADE Show Will Be Bigger Than Ever, Tickets are on Sale Now
content:
Bike event season is quickly approaching, and ticket sales to the shows are opening up. One of my favorite bike events of the year, MADE, has just announced the dates of the 2025 show and tickets are available now.

We’re told these tickets go fast. So secure your spot and get ready to celebrate the handmade bike industry, indy frame builders, domestic production, and some serious (and not so serious) artisan craftsmanship.

The MADE 2025 bicycle show will take place from August 22nd through the 24th. Once again, MADE will be at the Zidell Yards in Portland, Oregon. Exhibitor registration is also open.

This is MADE’s third year of elevating the craft by “bringing frame builders, media, and makers together.” If you haven’t gone, you should. The vibe is electric and powerful. This year the floorplan is said to be expanded, allowing for more builders and brands to take part and enjoy the magic that is MADE.

“We are thrilled with the reception over the last two years; MADE has surpassed expectations and continues to experience growth,” said Billy Sinkford, Co-Founder and Director of Show. “2025 will see an expanded floor plan and a lower cost to exhibit for builders. MADE’s core mission remains unchanged: to promote handmade bike culture, provide a platform for all builders, and facilitate access to both media and consumers.”

What to Expect at MADE 2025:

Tickets run
$25 (single day)
$10 (parking single day)
$35 (multi-day)
$15 (parking multi-day)

  • 3 days of consumer, media, and industry activations
  • Evening events and activations
  • 200+ Builders and Brands
  • New larger floorplan
  • Subsidized Booth Space for New Builders
  • Evening Events and Activations
  • Dates: 08/22/25 – 08/24/25

MADE.Bike

The post 2025 MADE Show Will Be Bigger Than Ever, Tickets are on Sale Now appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
